selections.name: Audacious Pursuit
selections.reason: Consistent performer who finished 2nd at this track and distance last start. Rates highly on recent form.

selections.name: Storm Runner
selections.reason: Last start winner at Happy Valley. Steps up in distance but brings winning form and confidence.

selections.name: Amazing Gaze
selections.reason: Zac Purton takes the ride. Solid 3rd two starts back at this track suggests ability to feature.

selections.name: Volcanic Spark
selections.reason: Consistent type with a good 3rd last start. Drawn well to get a nice run.

danger_horse.name: Supreme Mastermind
danger_horse.reason: James McDonald rides. Form is mixed but has the class to surprise if he brings his best.

selections.name: California Bay
selections.reason: Zac Purton aboard. Solid 3rd last start at this track and distance. Drawn perfectly in barrier 4.

selections.name: Chill Partners
selections.reason: Coming off a strong 2nd place finish. Improving type who should be right in the finish.

selections.name: Mr Cool
selections.reason: Consistent recent form (4th, 3rd). Wide draw is a concern but has the ability to overcome it.

selections.name: Winning Champion
selections.reason: Not beaten far last start (5th). Harry Bentley rides and drawn to get a soft run.

danger_horse.name: Mazing Grace
danger_horse.reason: Light weight and could sneak into the minors at odds.

selections.name: Rezeki
selections.reason: In peak form with a win and a 2nd in last two starts. The one to beat.

selections.name: Circuit Fiery
selections.reason: Zac Purton rides. Excellent recent form (2nd, 3rd, 1st). Drawn the rail.

selections.name: Blazing Beam
selections.reason: Winner two starts back. Disappointed last time but can bounce back.

selections.name: Francis Meynell
selections.reason: Solid 5th last start. Drawn well and has place claims.

danger_horse.name: Swagger Bro
danger_horse.reason: Wide draw hurts but has some ability if pace suits.

selections.name: Gold Patch
selections.reason: James McDonald rides. Won on debut at this track. Looks very promising despite the wide draw.

selections.name: Glaciated
selections.reason: Consistent performer coming off a 3rd. Drawn well to challenge.

selections.name: Find My Love
selections.reason: Solid 4th last start. Has the class to feature here.

selections.name: Always Fluke
selections.reason: 3rd last start. Light weight gives him a chance.

danger_horse.name: Victory Champion
danger_horse.reason: Drawn well and could improve on recent form.

selections.name: Island Buddy
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track. In top form and rates as the one to beat.

selections.name: Happy Shooter
selections.reason: Also a last start winner. Drawn ideally in barrier 2 to be right there.

selections.name: Conrad Patch
selections.reason: Hugh Bowman rides. Consistent 3rd last start. Major player.

selections.name: Voyage Boss
selections.reason: Not far away last start (5th). Can hit the frame.

danger_horse.name: Joy Capital
danger_horse.reason: Wide draw makes it tough but won two starts back.

selections.name: Galactic Voyage
selections.reason: Impressive winner last start. Despite the wide draw, has the speed to overcome it.

selections.name: Mickley
selections.reason: Strong 2nd last start. Drawn perfectly to get the run of the race.

selections.name: Celestial Hero
selections.reason: Consistent type (4th, 3rd). Drawn well and should be competitive.

selections.name: Sight Hermoso
selections.reason: Consistent placegetter (3rd, 3rd). Reliable.

danger_horse.name: Perfectday
danger_horse.reason: James McDonald rides. Can improve on recent form.

selections.name: Romantic Warrior
selections.reason: Superstar. Won last two G1s including the Stewards Cup. The clear standout.

selections.name: Voyage Bubble
selections.reason: Consistent G1 performer. 3rd to Romantic Warrior last time. The main danger.

selections.name: Ensued
selections.reason: Distance suits. Solid 4th last start. Place chance.

selections.name: My Wish
selections.reason: Solid 4th last time out. Can fill the minor placings.

selections.name: Aurio
selections.reason: Zac Purton rides. Drawn perfectly in barrier 2. Consistent form.

selections.name: Rising Force
selections.reason: In great form (1st, 2nd). Drawn well to challenge.

selections.name: Pakistan Legacy
selections.reason: Good 2nd last start. Has the ability to feature.

selections.name: Lucy In The Sky
selections.reason: Resuming from a break but has class. Drawn the rail.

danger_horse.name: Geneva
danger_horse.reason: Hugh Bowman rides. Resuming but won last start in May. Watch betting.

selections.name: Little Paradise
selections.reason: Won the Hong Kong Classic Mile impressively. The one to beat.

selections.name: Numbers
selections.reason: Won the G3 Centenary Vase last start. Strong contender.

selections.name: Sagacious Life
selections.reason: Zac Purton rides. 4th in the Classic Mile. Can improve.

selections.name: Dazzling Fit
selections.reason: Solid 3rd last start. Represents value for the placings.

danger_horse.name: Aerodynamics
danger_horse.reason: Zac Purton rides (listed on #3 too? Check jockeys). Actually Purton on #5 in OCR. Need to check. If Purton on #5, big danger.

selections.name: Gentlemen Legacy
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track and distance. Hard to go past.

selections.name: Karma
selections.reason: Solid 2nd last start. Consistent performer.

selections.name: Liveandletlive
selections.reason: 2nd to Gentlemen Legacy last start. Weight swing might help.

selections.name: Fortune Boy
selections.reason: 4th last start. Light weight gives him a chance.

danger_horse.name: Bravehearts
danger_horse.reason: Can run a race at odds.

selections.name: Emblazon
selections.reason: Won last start. Steps up in grade but drops significantly in weight. Good value.

selections.name: Beauty Eternal
selections.reason: Class runner. 5th last start in G1 company? Drops to Class 2. Big threat.

selections.name: Juneau Pride
selections.reason: Consistent 3rd last start. Andrea Atzeni rides.

selections.name: Gustosisimo
selections.reason: 3rd last start. Drawn the rail.

danger_horse.name: Healthy Happy
danger_horse.reason: Veteran who can pull out a run.
